file_content.text: You've awakened. I trust you can walk.
What is this place?
Where am I?
[Refuse to answer.]
Open this cell and I'll show you exactly what I'm capable of.
I can do a lot more than that.
Silence is perfectly acceptable, but it will not help you here. You are in the heart of our empire, now.
You are in the heart of our empire, now. I assure you, escape is impossible, even if you could make it past me.
Come along.
What "empire" have we entered?
The Eternal Empire. Zakuul.
You didn't even know whose territory you were invading?
We didn't "invade" anything. We were looking for someone.
This wasn't an invasion.
[Refuse to answer.]
Some outposts nearby were destroyed not long ago... your handiwork?
I don't think we invaded first.
In an armed warship?
We weren't looking for a friend.
What do you hope to achieve by taking us prisoner?
I have questions. You will provide the answers.
We will tell you nothing.
You won't have to speak to give me the answers I need.
You're taking us to your master.
I'm taking you to my father. Valkorion. The Immortal Emperor of Zakuul.
An Emperor. Just what we were searching for.
You will not find what you wanted here.
My flagship. You have arrived at the heart of our empire.
We tested your strength.
You seem to have suffered for it.
Less than your people did.
Prince Arcann. Final docking sequence initiated.
We recovered the records from your ship's computers. Or what was left of them. Fascinating reading.
That one soldier could have such a significant impact on a war of that scale... quite impressive.
You Jedi are quite influential. To think that you alone could alter the tide of a war at that scale... impressive.
You're just one person--a criminal, from all that I can tell--and you still influenced a galaxy-wide war. Impressive.
You Sith are apparently quite formidable. You most of all. To alter the course of galactic events as you have... quite impressive.
You're nothing but a hired gun, yet truly powerful individuals turn to you above all others. You've influenced a galaxy-wide war--very impressive.
That one mere spy could influence the outcome of a galaxy-wide war... impressive.
All of your soldiers appear to be droids. Not enough live volunteers?
Yet you prefer droid soldiers.
[Refuse to speak]
You don't need to be impressed with what I've done. You need to be afraid of what I'm going to do.
Imagine what I'll do to you.
Yes. We'll soon know what you're truly capable of.
I sense that you also have a strong connection to the Force.
The Force is strong with you.
I suspect we have more than that in common.
I can find volunteers when I need to.
I'd be happy to give you an autograph if you just loosen these restraints a bit....
Thanks!
I'm afraid I had other reasons for bringing you here.
I sense your connection to the Force. You have great strength... but do you know how to use it?
The Force is strong with you.
You are not here to educate.
If you're looking to have some work done, name your price. Otherwise, save your breath.
So make me an offer.
I don't think you'll be getting paid for this excursion.
Are you afraid I've come to your faraway empire to do the same thing?
Is that why I'm here?
Not afraid, no.
I hope you find your voice soon. You will need it.
Prince Arcann.
I wonder if silencing you might suffice. Take your superstitions elsewhere, Heskal. You are not needed here.
Your followers don't seem to be as sure of your invincibility as you are.
Dissent in the ranks?
Nonsense repeated does not become truth.
Come along.
Unlock these shackles and I'll show you exactly what I'm capable of.
I can do a lot more than that.
Heskal. Still waiting for the catastrophe that you and your Scions foretold?
You may close your ears to the whispers of fate, my prince, but they cannot be silenced.
[Say Nothing]
Your friend was just trying to warn you. Bringing us here won't end well for you.
You should have listened.
Unimportant relics with unfounded beliefs. Don't be swayed by their nonsense.
Is this why you brought us? To hear you bicker with soothsayers?
